languages.text: {n}В недрах вокс-синтезатора Паскаля рождается утробно низкий звук — словно тектонические плиты планеты смещаются, круша друг друга. Из этого мощного рокота рождаются слова, исполненные силы:{/n} "Мы следуем пути, начертанному великим разумом. Но путь этот ведет в темные области".

{n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth, as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. The mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power:{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."
languages.original_text: {n}В недрах вокс-синтезатора Паскаля рождается утробно низкий звук — словно тектонические плиты планеты смещаются, круша друг друга. Из этого мощного рокота рождаются слова, исполненные силы:{/n} "Мы следуем пути, начертанному великим разумом. Но путь этот ведет в темные области".

traits.locale_text: {n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth: as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. That mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power.{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}低いガラガラという音がパスカルのヴォクス・シンセの奥から聞こえてくる。それはまるで惑星の地質のプレートが動き、お互いにぶつかり合っているかのようである。力強いガラガラという音は力のある言葉を生み出す。{/n}「我々は偉大なる精神が作図してくれた道を辿るのです。しかしその道は闇へと続いています」
languages.original_text: {n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth, as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. The mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power:{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."

traits.locale_text: {n}低いガラガラという音がパスカルのヴォクス・シンセの奥から聞こえてくる。それはまるで惑星の地質のプレートが動き、お互いにぶつかり合っているかのようである。力強いガラガラという音は力のある言葉を生み出す。{/n}「我々は偉大なる精神が作図してくれた道を辿るのです。しかしその道は闇へと続いています」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵合成器深处传来了低沉的喉音，仿佛行星的地质板块在不断移动，相互挤压。从铿锵有力的隆隆声中，传来了充满力量的话语。{/n}“我们正在沿着伟人绘制的道路前进，但那条道路却通向黑暗之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth, as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. The mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power:{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵合成器深处传来了低沉的喉音，仿佛行星的地质板块在不断移动，相互挤压。从铿锵有力的隆隆声中，传来了充满力量的话语。{/n}“我们正在沿着伟人绘制的道路前进，但那条道路却通向黑暗之中。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aus den Tiefen von Pasqals Vox-Synth erklingt ein tiefer, kehliger Ton, als würden die tektonischen Platten des Planeten sich verschieben und aneinander stoßen. Dieses starke Rumpeln bringt Worte hervor, die Macht in sich zu tragen scheinen.{/n} "Wir folgen einem Pfad, den ein großer Geist vorgezeichnet hat. Aber dieser Pfad führt an dunkle Orte."
languages.original_text: {n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth, as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. The mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power:{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus den Tiefen von Pasqals Vox-Synth erklingt ein tiefer, kehliger Ton, als würden die tektonischen Platten des Planeten sich verschieben und aneinander stoßen. Dieses starke Rumpeln bringt Worte hervor, die Macht in sich zu tragen scheinen.{/n} "Wir folgen einem Pfad, den ein großer Geist vorgezeichnet hat. Aber dieser Pfad führt an dunkle Orte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un bruit sourd et guttural s'élève des profondeurs du synthétiseur-vox de Pasqal, comme si les plaques tectoniques de la planète bougeaient et s'entrechoquaient. Ce puissant grondement se traduit en paroles empreintes de puissance.{/n} « Nous suivons une voie tracée par un esprit visionnaire, mais cette voie mène en des lieux ténébreux. »
languages.original_text: {n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth, as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. The mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power:{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bruit sourd et guttural s'élève des profondeurs du synthétiseur-vox de Pasqal, comme si les plaques tectoniques de la planète bougeaient et s'entrechoquaient. Ce puissant grondement se traduit en paroles empreintes de puissance.{/n} « Nous suivons une voie tracée par un esprit visionnaire, mais cette voie mène en des lieux ténébreux. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sonido grave y gutural se eleva desde lo más profundo del voco sintetizador de Pasqal: suena como si las placas tectónicas del planeta se estuvieran desplazando y comprimiendo entre sí. El formidable murmullo evoca palabras imbuidas de gran poder.{/n} «Seguimos una ruta trazada por una mente preclara. Pero esa ruta nos conduce a lugares tenebrosos».
languages.original_text: {n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth, as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. The mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power:{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sonido grave y gutural se eleva desde lo más profundo del vocosintetizador de Pasqal: suena como si las placas tectónicas del planeta se estuvieran desplazando y comprimiendo entre sí. El formidable murmullo evoca palabras imbuidas de gran poder.{/n} «Seguimos una ruta trazada por una mente preclara. Pero esa ruta nos conduce a lugares tenebrosos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voks sentezleyicisinin derinliklerinden, gezegenin tektonik tabakaları yerinden oynuyor ve birbirine çarpıyormuş gibi boğuk, gırtlaksı bir sesi çıkıyor. Bu muazzam gümbürtü, yanında kudretli sözcükler getiriyor.{/n} "Bizler ulu bir zihnin haritalandırdığı yolu takip ederiz. Bu yol, karanlık yerlere uzanır."
languages.original_text: {n}A low, guttural sound rises from the depths of Pasqal's vox-synth, as though the planet's tectonic plates are shifting and crushing each other. The mighty rumble brings forth words imbued with power:{/n} "We follow a path charted by a great mind. But that path leads to dark places."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voks sentezleyicisinin derinliklerinden boğuk, gırtlaksı bir ses çıkıyor. Âdeta gezegenin tektonik tabakaları yerinden oynuyor ve birbirine çarpıyor gibi. Bu muazzam gümbürtü, yanında kudretli sözcükler getiriyor:{/n} "Bizler ulu bir zihnin haritalandırdığı bir yolu takip ederiz ancak bu yol, karanlık yerlere uzanır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
